message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it presents a great value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you're providing. However, I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for the product. I hope we can reach an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go as low as $12,000.  Would you consider $13,000? I'm confident this product will exceed your expectations.

I appreciate your response, Alice. I understand your position, but I am still unable to meet the price of $13,000. I would like to propose $12,500 for the product. I hope this offers a fair compromise for both of us.
